overview: Kent Deverell helps shape the strategic direction of Fluid and oversees our commitment to outstanding client service and satisfaction. Proactive management. Successful project execution. Client expectations met and exceeded. He keeps his eyes on the prize – our clients. Kent plays a pivotal role in the growth of Fluid’s client base. Kent leads project teams to deliver innovations that drive direct results for our clients. In fact, 100% of our clients are willing to be references. Kent is our high-level go-to-guy for our accounts such as THE NORTH FACE® Brand Apparel, JanSport, Macrovision, Design Within Reach and Bare Escentuals. Developing relationships is a part of his repertoire. This suits us perfectly.
